*div1 type="summary"* *p*Henry Austin to Austin, Matamoros, June 3. 1830. Reason to fear that Terán wants to remove Austin from Texas and hold him as a hostage.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Matamoros */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="06-03-1830">June 3d 1830*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col. S F Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*My dear Sir In a letter which I wrote you by *person_mentioned*Captn John Austin*/person_mentioned* I expressed a wish that you might be induced to accept *person_mentioned*Genl Teran*/person_mentioned*s invitation to meet him here rather than at *location_mentioned*La bahia */location_mentioned*or *location_mentioned*St Antonio*/location_mentioned*— Since writing circumstances have transpired which cause me to suspect the *person_mentioned*Genl*/person_mentioned*s Views to be somewhat treacherous*/p*
*p*When he came here one of his *person_mentioned*aids */person_mentioned*told *person_mentioned*Col Bradburn*/person_mentioned* who was then with me that one of the*person_mentioned* Genl*/person_mentioned*s objects in visiting *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*was to remove you from the *location_mentioned*Colony*/location_mentioned*, your influence with the *person_mentioned*colonists*/person_mentioned* being dangerous to the security of the province—*/p*
*p*I paid but little attention to the observation at the time supposing it to be impossible for the *person_mentioned*Genl*/person_mentioned* to meditate so rash a measure—*/p*
*p*Today there is great excitement amongst the *person_mentioned*Americans*/person_mentioned*, on acct of a declaration *date_mentioned n="06-02-1830">last night*/date_mentioned* by the *person_mentioned*Genl */person_mentioned*to a *person_mentioned*Mexican */person_mentioned*in presence of an *person_mentioned*American */person_mentioned*whom he supposed not to understand *person_mentioned*Spanish*/person_mentioned*, that he viewed the *person_mentioned*foreigners */person_mentioned**location_mentioned*in this part of the country */location_mentioned*as the Most dangerous *person_mentioned*enemies */person_mentioned*of it particularly the *person_mentioned*North Americans*/person_mentioned* whose sole object was to wrest from the *person_mentioned*Mexicans */person_mentioned**location_mentioned*their property*/location_mentioned* and so much of their *location_mentioned*territory */location_mentioned*as they could get— The *person_mentioned*American*/person_mentioned* could not refrain from asking him if it were possible that such were his real sentiments to which he replied they were— You know the duplicity of the *person_mentioned*Mexican */person_mentioned*character—their general want of faith in all transactions and the necessity of being guarded against their villany— It is possible the observation of the*person_mentioned* Genls Aid to Col B */person_mentioned*was with good information of the subject. It may therefore be wise to keep yourself under cover of your own rifles, which *person_mentioned*Genl Teran*/person_mentioned* has not nerve nor power to encounter you must take good care not to let it transpire that I communicate with you on this subject as it would probably consign me to the *location_mentioned*Calabose*/location_mentioned**/p*
*p*I shall be off as soon as I possibly can but have too much property outstanding to do it immediately*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*H Austin */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*/div1*
